name: BlastZone
description:
CONTROLS:

Horizontal Aiming: Left - Right keys
Vertical Aiming: Up - Down keys
Fire: Spacebar
Increase Power: Right Shift key
Decrease Power: Right CRTL key

INSTRUCTIONS:

Two opponents take turns lobbing shots at each other.

Change your horizontal direction to line up your shot. Don't forget to adjust for wind.

Adjust your vertical angle to alter your range and trajectory.

Set your power to find the right range to match your vertical angle and the enemy position.
